title: Saboriman Ametani Kantarou
original_name: さぼリーマン 飴谷甘太朗
sinopse: Kantarou Ametani is a good looking single guy with glasses who works at a publish company, Kicchou company, as a salesman. People around him put their trust in him because He completes his jobs quickly and efficiently. But he has a secret he's been hiding at all cost...
